hadiths.text: Narrated Al-Mughira:The Prophet (ﷺ) used to stand (in the prayer) or pray till both his feet or legs swelled. He was asked why (he offered such an unbearable prayer) and he said, "should I not be a thankful slave

chapter.ara-name: باب قِيَامِ النَّبِيِّ صلى الله عليه وسلم حَتَّى تَرِمَ قَدَمَاهُ
chapter.eng-name: Standing of the Prophet (ﷺ) at night
